document_data.name: Ammanadas Silversword
document_data.mainbody: '''Ammanadas Silversword''' was a member of the [[Silversword]] noble house of [[Cormyr]]. In [[1369 DR]], he stabbed [[Ensibal Threen]], a [[War Wizards|War Wizard]], in the throat for believing him to be a supporter of [[Vangerdahast]]'s proposed regency. He was quickly subdued by [[Lareth Gulur]], a passing [[Purple Dragons|Purple Dragon]].
